msContents.summary: This is a single-text manuscript containing the Pañcarātrarakṣā of Vedāntadeśika. On the front cover the title Pañcarātrarakṣā is written along with some additional information which is not completely legible: śrīnivāsan kesuda r ācārryar Number 50 in blue pen. Cover folios are stitched with a thick white thread at the upper line, possibly for the sake of preservation. Balhaṇacaritraṃ is written in Grantha script at the centre of the first blank folio after the front cover folio.

msItem.title: Pañcarātrarakṣā
msItem.author: Vedāntadeśika
msItem.incipit:
cāturvyūhaṃ paraṃ brahma ṣāṭguṇyaparikarmmitaṃ | pāñcarātrasya kṛtsnasya prasūtiṃ paryupāsmahe | anananyadaivatasthāyiny āyatemahi te vayaṃ | pañcarātramahāṃbhodhi
pāradṛśvini sajjane |
msItem.explicit:
sibhiḥ | moghāśā parisandhi vimukhaiśvaryyamahāphalotgamadhiyā caryeyam ācāryatāṃ | tyaktaṃ śāstram alepakaprabhṛtibhiḥ kin tena tasyāgataṃ pradviṣṭaṃ jagadekacakṣuṣi divābhītai
s tatas tasya kiṃ | dugdhaṃ vi [CORRECTION: pi] ttahatair jugupsitam atas tasyāpi kiṃ dūrjanais tyaktañ ced api mat kṛtaṃ suruciraṃ kin deśikais tyajyate |
msItem.finalRubric:
iti kavitārkikasimhasya sarvatantrasva
tantrasya śrimadveṃkaṭanāthasya śrīmadvedāntācāryyakṛtiṣu śrīpāñcarātrarakṣāyāṃ nityavyākhyānākhyas tritṛtīyodhikāraḥ | saṃpūrṇā ceyaṃ śrīpāñcarātrarakṣā |
hariḥ om śubham astu śrīraṃganāyakīsametaśrīraṃganāthaparabrahmaṇe namaḥśrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥśrīmate nigamāntamahāgurave namaḥśrīḥḥ |
msItem.colophon: jayanāmasaṃvatsaraṃ māśimāsaṃ kṛṣṇapakṣaṃ trayodaśiyil goyūṣalagnattil eḻuti mukiñcatu ceguṟum śrīnivāsan svahastalikhitaṃ | śrīraghunandanaparabhrahmaṇe namaḥ

support.p: Thin palm leaf folio which are stiched at the upper side of the folio.

extent.measure: 1 blank folio 2 guard folio and 87 written folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration in the left margin on the recto of the folio.
supportDesc.condition: Good state of preservation with some folios having slight damage. Cover folios are in a delicate condition.

additions.desc: On 1r in the left margin: śrīpāñcarātrarakṣai hariḥ om

origin.origDate: According to the colophon the manuscript was completed approximately during the year 1894-95 in the month of Māgha (mid-February to mid-March) on the evening of the 13th day of the kṛṣṇapakṣa. It is written by śrīnivāsan.
